title: New River Gorge National River: Teens
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Teens              Teens          Â    Rangers in Training Rangers in Training is a free program that gives local high school students an opportunity to discover and enjoy some of the history, nature and recreation that New River Gorge National River has to offer. Participants will hike trails, white-water raft, fish, rock climb, and discover some of the natural and cultural history of the gorge as they learn about how National Park Service rangers care for America's special places. For more information check out our Rangers in Training page.
